experience: You and Richard both know saba Perween and Neha Prajapat
Richard can introduce you to 4 people at Tektronix

Photo resist strip sustaining engineer in production wafer fab.Install, Upgrade, repair , and preventive maintentenance of photo resist strip tools.Photo resist strip tool technical content requires experience in mechanics, robotics, electronics, software, pnuematics, vaccuum systems, RF equipment, facilities electrical distribution, facilities process water system, and facilities process gas system.Position also requires:Familiarity with parts and spares management ordering/returning,Use of SAP applications for time/labor/parts management.PC proficency with MSOffice applications.Customer facing customer service skills.Willing and able to be flexible in supporting 24x7 workplace plus required travel assignments.

Failure analysis Lab engineer.  Evaluate Electronic, Chemical, or Physical properties, of various components and materials used in manufacturing of Inkjet Printers.  Some equipment used are Instron Mechanical Testing System, SEM, X-Ray Microscope, Acoustic Microscope, and a wide variety of electronic test instrumentation.

Equipment Engineering group leader. Lead Equipment Engineering group which supported multiple shifts. Serve as primary contact for product engineering and management on issues pertaining to equipment performance. The group was responsible to troubleshoot, repair, calibrate, and perform preventative maintenance on ATE systems, Laser Wafer Trim systems and their peripherals. Equipment types include ATE systems, wafer probers, IC handlers, and LWT Systems.  The group also held responsibility for new equipment installations and equipment upgrades plus managing support agreements with equipment vendors. Proactively interact with engineers and equipment operators in solving product yield problems. Prioritize own workload and effectively perform assignments with no supervision.
Perform preventive maintenance, troubleshoot, repair and calibrate ATE systems, Laser Wafer Trim systems and their peripherals for Tektronix’s Integrated Circuit Operations facility.
Troubleshoot, Integrate, test, and calibrate a wide range of Tektronix test and measurement equipment.
